full_summary:
# Upright Bright Field/Fluorescence Microscope with Accessories
================///
## Tender Information
--------

### Tender Reference:
Solicitation Number: 5000069456
Reference Number: cb-7763-67334203
Amendment Number: 2
Published Date: 2023-07-31

### Tender Closing Date and Time:
2023-09-11T15:00:00 (ETA: 15:00 hours)

### Tender Status:
Tender Status: Expired
Amendment Date: 2023-09-11
Notice Type: Not Applicable
Procurement Category: Goods and Services
Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Technical Specifications
--------

### Technical Description:

The subject tender is for the supply of an upright bright field/fluorescence microscope with associated accessories from qualified suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement.

### Scope of Supply:
The scope of supply includes the provision of an upright bright field/fluorescence microscope and accessories. The delivery shall satisfy the end-user's laboratory and scientific equipment requirements.

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery:
 Canada, with specific preference to Burlington, Ontario.

## Contact Information
--------

### Contracting Entity:
Environment and Climate Change Canada
351 Saint-Joseph Blvd
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0H3, Canada

### Contracting Entity Information:
Contact Name: Samantha Hatzinikou
Email: samantha.hatzinikou@ec.gc.ca
Phone: (873) 500-0150

## Additional Information

The federal notices are maintained on a separate website [Canada BUYs](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

Tender description documents are available by clicking on the [Notice of Proposed Procurement](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7763/notice-of-proposed-procurement.pdf). 
The Contracting Entity is not responsible for the translation of the documents. It is the responsibility of the offeror to ensure their offer is complete and submitted on time. Please confirm details can be translated prior to submitting your proposal.
